items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have to stay home to help Mary.
Tom doesn\'t know how to start a lawn mower.
You\'re not going to see Tom today, are you?
You cooked the steak just the way I like it.
You guys are roughly the same age as we are.
Did anything unusual happen today at school?
Did you give Tom a present for his birthday?
Did you guys talk about me while I was gone?
Did you have a dog when you were growing up?
You\'re the prettiest woman I\'ve ever seen.
Tom isn\'t likely to be at tonight\'s party.
I have to study for tomorrow\'s French test.
I haven\'t been getting enough sleep lately.
We\'ll tell Tom everything he needs to know.
Could you send me more information by email?
I was about to leave when the doorbell rang.
Tom ought to have been here a long time ago.
Tom owes me a relatively large sum of money.
Tom paid no attention to Mary all afternoon.
Tom pedaled his bicycle as fast as he could.
We have to see what works and what doesn\'t.
We haven\'t finished what we have to do yet.
You shouldn\'t have come here to begin with.
Tom wasn\'t able to do what he wanted to do.
Tom wasn\'t sure if he was going to make it.
Tom wasn\'t surprised to see Mary with John.
Tom said it was too risky to go there alone.
Tom said you wanted to go to Boston with us.
Tom held the cup for Mary as she took a sip.
Tom is a liar if he says he saw us together.
Tom is about the same age as you, I suppose.
If Tom were here, what would you say to him?
If you did that for me, it would help a lot.
I couldn\'t care less about what Tom thinks.
Which one do you think Tom is going to want?
Why do you have to put me down all the time?
Why have you been asking me these questions?
Tom is aware the police are looking for him.
Tom is coming back from Australia next week.
Tom is fluent in French, English and German.
Tom is glad the school year is finally over.
Tom is going on a picnic tomorrow with Mary.
Tom is going to be punished for what he did.
Tom starts giggling every time he sees Mary.
Tom thought he heard a mouse in the kitchen.
Tom thought that Mary would like this movie.
Tom told Mary what he really thought of her.
You\'re supposed to know what to do already.
Shouldn\'t you be minding your own business?
I\'m breaking up with my girlfriend tonight.
